data.title: Pearl Buck – Other resources
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1938 was awarded to Pearl Buck "for her rich and truly epic descriptions of peasant life in China and for her biographical masterpieces"

Video

From the Merv Griffin Show 1966: Pearl S. Buck talks with Merv Griffin about her newest book, her charity work helping Asian orphans fathered by US servicemen, communism in China and her new book ideas.
